pageContent:
BHARGAV CHOWDARY KONIKI 
                                                    SALESFORCE DEVELOPER 
Email: kbhargavchowdary1@gmail.com                                                            Phone: +1 (616)-244-8511 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY: 
• Over 9+ years of hands-on experience in Salesforce development, demonstrating proficiency in Apex, 
Visualforce, Lightning Components, and other technologies to create robust and scalable solutions 
tailored to business needs. 
• Extensive Experience with developing Apex Classes, Apex Trigger, Schedule Apex, Batch Apex, 
Apex  Web  Service, Partner  WSDL  &  Enterprise  WSDL,SOM  and  Visual  Force  (Page, 
Component & Controllers). 
• Experience  in  building  reusable  UI  components  and  pages  with  the Lightning  component 
framework. 
• Handled migration from Salesforce Classic to Lightning.

Component & Controllers).

framework.

by event-driven programming. A good understanding of Lightning mode and its features. 
• Used Salesforce Lightning Design System (SLDS) for developing Lightning Components, Actions, 
Event, and Server-Side Controller. 
• Worked on Lightning Components for building customized components replacing the existing ones. 
• Experience in Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Community Cloud, and App Exchange applications. 
• Good work experience in Custom Integration of Outbound Messages with Workflow & Approvals, 
built  Reports,  configured  Process  builder,  Custom  Objects,  and  Tabs,  Email  Services,  Security

built  Reports,  configured  Process  builder,  Custom  Objects,  and  Tabs,  Email  Services,  Security

• Familiar with Steel Brick CPQ for subscription, billing, invoicing and can take control of sales process 
from Quote to cash. Generated Revenue recognition status automatically with Steel Brick CPQ. 
• Good Knowledge of Demandware and Commerce Cloud. 
• Experience in SFDC user configuration and maintenance activities that includes User Management, 
Role hierarchies, Permission Sets, SOM, Security, Profiles, and Sharing rules.

Role hierarchies, Permission Sets, SOM, Security, Profiles, and Sharing rules.

recommendations on any gadget.

• Ability  to  meet  deadlines  and  handle  pressure  in  coordinating  multiple  tasks  in  a  work/project 
environment. Versatile team player with excellent analytical, presentation, and interpersonal skills. 
Experience in onsite and offshore coordination. Problem-solving skills in the technology arena. 
• Accomplished Salesforce Developer with extensive experience in Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning 
Aura Framework, delivering scalable solutions to meet complex business requirements. 
• Adept  at  end-to-end  development  on  the Force.com platform,  encompassing Apex Triggers, 
Controllers, Visualforce Pages, Lightning Components, and integration with external systems using 
Apex Web Services. 
• Proven track record in implementing automation solutions through Workflows, Approval Processes,

Apex Web Services. 
• Proven track record in implementing automation solutions through Workflows, Approval Processes, 
Process Builder, and Flow Builder, streamlining business processes and enhancing overall operational 
efficiency. 
• Expertise  in  data  management  using SOQL & SOSL queries,  Data  Loader,  and  integration  with 
external data sources, ensuring data accuracy, consistency, and synchronization across the Salesforce 
environment. 
• Demonstrated  success  in  cross-functional  teamwork,  collaborating  with  stakeholders, UI/UX 
designers, and QA teams to deliver cohesive solutions aligned with business objectives.

• Proficient  in Agile methodologies  and  SDLC  processes,  consistently  delivering  high-quality 
Salesforce applications through iterative development, testing, and deployment cycles. 
• Well-versed in a versatile technology stack, including AWS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and various 
integration  methods  (SOAP,  REST,  JSON,  XML),  with  a  keen  eye  for  software  architecture  and 
UI/UX design principles. 
 
CERTIFICATIONS: 
• Salesforce Certified Administrator (ID - 22669045)  
• Salesforce Certified Platform Developer I (ID - 3808436)

Salesforce Development: Apex  Language,  Visualforce,  Lightning  Aura  Framework,  Lightning

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE: 
 
Client: JM Family Enterprises, Florida     Oct 2021 - Present 
Role: Salesforce Developer 
Responsibilities: 
• Created modern Enterprise Lightning Apps combining Lightning Design System, Lightning App 
Builder, and Lightning Component features. 
• Upgraded some Apps from Salesforce Classic to Lightning Experience to develop the rich user 
interface and better interaction of pages. 
• Created Lightning app pages, home pages integrating the custom components for Lightning App 
builder. 
• Maintenance of installed Managed Packages in Lightning using Apex. Experienced in using the 
Data Migration tool called Data Loader. 
• Minimized code in JavaScript Controllers by adding reusable functions in Helper Component. 
• Enabled ‘Visible in Customer Portal’ so that care team members with Custom case team role are 
visible to community members (patients). 
• Updated the APEX Controller and Helper functions regularly making the Component Context-

visible to community members (patients). 
• Updated the APEX Controller and Helper functions regularly making the Component Context-
Aware as per business requirement. 
• Supported in the maintenance of Oracle integration by creating and managing the mapping of 
products, price book Entries between the two systems. 
• Enabled Email to Case and Web to Case from the company's front-end website. 
• Tested  apps  by  appending  multiple  components  to  a  Lightning  Application  thereby  deployed 
Applications from Sandbox to Production. 
• Used refined global search in Lightning by developing Apex Controllers to search on integration 
data.

• Experienced in usage of Force.com IDE for creating, modifying, testing, and deploying Force.com 
applications. 
• Involved in configuration enhancements for the CPQ and CLM functionalities and end to end 
testing. 
• Well  versed  with  Configure  Price  Quote (Salesforce  CPQ)  Product  and  Pricing,  Standard 
Quote/Proposal  creation  process  and  understand  configuration  settings  as  they  relate  to  the 
business requirements. 
• Configured  operating  hours,  skill  sets,  and  standard  appointment  requirements  unique  to  the 
organization. 
• Used SOQL and SOSL statements within Governor Limits for data manipulation needs of the 
application using platform database objects. 
• Visualforce  Pages  for  Lightning  Experience  (workflows  to  automate  task  assignment,  and 
streamline the business process), alternates for Java Script Codes, Sharing Visualforce pages 
between Classic and Lightning.

streamline the business process), alternates for Java Script Codes, Sharing Visualforce pages 
between Classic and Lightning. 
• Worked extensively in customization of Service Cloud Console by embedding Visualforce pages 
in custom console components, highlight panel, an interaction log. 
• Worked on Lightning Process builder flows, Connect API, Chatter, and quick Action. 
• Configured Salesforce Developer Experience (DX) to streamline the development life       cycle 
and  improve  team  development  and  collaboration,  facilitates  automated  testing, continuous 
integration (CI), and Continuous Deployments makes the release cycle more efficient and agile. 
• Enabled Dev Hub with SFDX packages and created scratch orgs from Bitbucket. 
• Deployed Salesforce (SFDX) packages into scratch orgs using Salesforce CLI and VScode. 
• Used field level security along with page layouts in Lightning to manage access to certain fields.

• Deployed Salesforce (SFDX) packages into scratch orgs using Salesforce CLI and VScode. 
• Used field level security along with page layouts in Lightning to manage access to certain fields. 
• Built Agent collection forms to send information to the claims team using the new Flow Builder. 
• Implemented the Web Services through WSDL in Salesforce.com for outbound messaging. 
• Created a Root product to represent an insurance product and its constituent components, including 
an attribute category, attributes, and child specifications such as for a coverage. 
• Involved in daily stand up meetings, Scrum. This resulted in a good solution to the business 
requirement. 
Environment: Lightning Component Development, Apex Development, Visualforce Pages, Salesforce CPQ 
(Configure, Price, Quote), Service Cloud Console Customization, Data Loader, Oracle Integration, Salesforce 
CLI, VScode, Scratch Orgs, CPQ and CLM Configuration, SOQL, SOSL, JavaScript, Java 8, Spring MVC,

CLI, VScode, Scratch Orgs, CPQ and CLM Configuration, SOQL, SOSL, JavaScript, Java 8, Spring MVC, 
,Hibernate, ASP.NET, Git, Copado DevOps. 
 
Client: AT&T, Dallas, TX     Jul 2019 – Sept 2021

• Designed,  and  developed  the  Custom  objects,  Validation  rules,  Page  layouts,  Custom  tabs,

• Created page layouts, and search layouts to organize fields, custom links, related lists, and other

Client: Thomson Reuters, Chennai, India   Sep 2017 – Apr 2019

Responsibilities: 
• Developed dynamic components with complex search and sort functionality.

architecture to monitor Einstein Analytics services and releases in realtime.

receive extra context data. 
• Developed Post Installation scripts to generate populate custom settings and sample data.

from various APIs and displayed them on to the component. 
• Worked extensively in customization of Service Cloud Console by embedding Visualforce pages

from various APIs and displayed them on to the component.

• Performed detailed analysis of business and technical requirements and created a data model using 
standard and custom objects. 
• Responsible  for  performing  administrative  tasks,  ensuring  Data  Integrity,  and  working  with 
commercial operations management to identify additional opportunities to productively integrate

• Working in the agile-scrum delivery framework, actively participating in daily stand-ups/scrums,

Services, and created/utilized email templates in HTML and Visualforce.
